entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Snow level at valley bottom. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Flurries over northern sections in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries over northern sections. Amount 2 cm over northern sections. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
